name: IRIS Neat and Dry All-in-One Training Pads Large Size

reviews.name: IRIS Neat and Dry All-in-One Training Pads Large Size
reviews.reviewText:
Very absorbent and the dogs were attracted to them. The larger size is great for the bigger puppy who tended to miss on the smaller pads.
Watch using on carpet if you accidentially step on it where it's wet you may slide across the floor.
reviews.title: Training pads

reviews.name: IRIS Neat and Dry All-in-One Training Pads Large Size
reviews.reviewText: I have two dogs and these pads work really well. I recommend them without reservations. They make a lot less work for me.
reviews.title: Best ever

reviews.name: IRIS Neat and Dry All-in-One Training Pads Large Size
reviews.reviewText: It does not contain enough absorbent material for the urine to get trapped in. I expected better. Won't buy this brand again.
reviews.title: Poor quality

reviews.name: IRIS Neat and Dry All-in-One Training Pads Large Size
reviews.reviewText: We gave a 20 year old cat that doesn't always make it all the way into the litter box now so we put these pads under the litter box for any accidents she has. The pad absorbs the urine and the floor does't get wet. I will buy his product again.
reviews.title: good product

reviews.name: IRIS Neat and Dry All-in-One Training Pads Large Size
reviews.reviewText:
Product shipped through Lasership. Worst experience with delivery ever from Walmart and to add ... wrong size sent.

This product is just as my title states ... I guess you get what you pay for. No fault of anyone, but mine.

Walmart ... stick with FedEx. 125% better service. PLUS FedEx don't lie and say "Attempted Delivery", 5 straight days, when some was home.
reviews.title: Flimsy and Non Absorbing
